question: Weaves textile fair 2019 is to be hosted by which Indian city?
explanation: Weaves, South Indiaâ€™s premier textile fair, will be held from November 27-30 at Texvalley. Texvalley is the largest wholesale textile market in Erode. The four-day event is being jointly organised by the Confederation of Indian Industry (CII) and Texvalley. Over 4,000 to 5,000 weavers are expected to participate in the fair.
